events.name: TechFest 2026
events.description: Annual technical festival showcasing innovative projects, coding competitions, and tech talks by industry experts.
events.longDescription: TechFest 2026 is our flagship technical event featuring hackathons, coding competitions, project exhibitions, and guest lectures from leading technology companies. Students will compete in various categories including web development, mobile apps, AI/ML, and robotics.

events.name: Cultural Extravaganza
events.description: A vibrant celebration of arts, music, dance, and literature with performances by talented students.
events.longDescription: Join us for an evening of cultural performances including classical and contemporary dance, musical performances, drama, poetry recitation, and art exhibitions. This event celebrates the diverse cultural heritage of our student community.

events.name: Sports Championship 2024
events.description: Inter-departmental sports competition featuring cricket, football, basketball, and athletics.
events.longDescription: Annual inter-departmental sports championship with competitions in cricket, football, basketball, volleyball, badminton, table tennis, and track & field events. Teams from all departments will compete for the championship trophy.

events.name: Academic Excellence Awards
events.description: Recognition ceremony for outstanding academic achievements and research contributions.
events.longDescription: Annual ceremony to recognize students with exceptional academic performance, research publications, and innovative projects. Awards will be presented in various categories including Best Research Paper, Outstanding Academic Performance, and Innovation in Technology.

events.name: Departmental Symposium - CSE
events.description: Computer Science and Engineering department symposium on emerging technologies and career opportunities.
events.longDescription: A comprehensive symposium focusing on latest trends in computer science, artificial intelligence, cybersecurity, and software development. Industry professionals will share insights about career opportunities and emerging technologies.

events.name: Annual Day Celebration 2023
events.description: Grand annual day celebration with performances, awards, and cultural programs.
events.longDescription: The most awaited event of the year featuring cultural performances, award ceremonies, and special guests. A celebration of achievements, talents, and the spirit of our college community.

events.name: Hackathon 2023
events.description: 24-hour coding marathon to solve real-world problems using innovative technology solutions.
events.longDescription: Intensive 24-hour hackathon where teams of students collaborate to develop innovative solutions for real-world challenges. Mentorship from industry experts and exciting prizes for winning teams.

events.name: Career Fair 2024
events.description: Career guidance and placement opportunities with leading companies and startups.
events.longDescription: Connect with top recruiters and explore career opportunities across various industries. Representatives from leading companies will conduct interviews, provide career guidance, and share insights about industry trends.
